Exclusion criteria: Patterns concerning the interfaces of the browser or the website including the chatbot
Patterns concerning Software-as-a-Service or tasks which are not feasible for chatbots

Inclusion criteria: Chatbot functionalities applicable to web interfaces
Exclusion criteria: Chatbot functionalities related to desktop or mobile applications

Inclusion criteria: Chatbot functionalities which are not bound to specific platforms
Exclusion criteria: Chatbot functionalities which are not clearly distinguished from others
